job.title: Geospatial Software Test Engineer
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtjob descriptionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwhat is it like to put your skills to work with one of the largest global defense companies that lives by we protect those who protect us who protects national security and keeps critical information and infrastructure secure gratifying as part of our engineering team you will work with commercial geospatial products and solutions for key military security and incident response operations to a variety of commercial development and research initiativesltbrgtltbrgtwe are looking for a software test engineer who will be able to plug into a dynamic and fast paced team of engineers the test engineer will work side by side with our desktop development team developing socet gxp socet gxp is used in critical operations ranging from homeland security disaster relief and humanitarian efforts to defense missions conducted by various commands and tactical units to stay on top of this fastpaced environment socet gxp is seeking a test engineer to join our team the test engineer will be responsible for installing and executing integration tests interacting with multiple software products from across the gxp ecosystem including desktop serverbased webbased applications and web services and will need to develop a strong understanding of how the applications work together the candidate will be responsible for manual testing user interfaces and backend servicesltbrgtltbrgttypical responsibilities of a geospatial software test engineer will includeltbrgtltulgtltligt testing of software user interfaces both desktop and webbasedltligtltligt verifying bugs and user storiesltligtltligt participate in scrumsltligtltligt implement and apply the principles of safe agileltligtltligt troubleshooting backend server servicesltligtltligt running automated test scripts evaluating test results and working with software developers to resolve failuresltligtltligt identifying testing gaps and writing new automated tests or test casesltligtltligt install gxp software productsltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtabout gxpltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtthe geospatial exploitation products gxp business provides licensed software capabilities and geospatial technology rampampd gxps ability to draw on customer feedback and technology expertise has allowed it to deliver superior products to the user community gxp often finds ways to improve software implementation through user conferences and regional workshops where important feedback and insight is gathered from customersltbrgtltbrgtgxp commercial software gxp xplorer gxp webview socet gxp and socet set provide customers with comprehensive image and video analysis data management geospatial production and stateoftheart sensordata processing and analytics technologies which provide compact and scalable solutions to challenging problems in areas of video analytics sensor data processing computer vision and machine learning these products serve government and civil customers needs for photogrammetry mapping gis image exploitation precision targeting geoint geospatial intelligence movint movement intelligence d visualization simulation and mission planningltbrgtltbrgtplease note that pursuant to a government contract this specific position requires us citizenship statusltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtrequired education experience ampamp systems electronic systemsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtbae systems inc is the us subsidiary of bae systems plc an international defense aerospace and security company which delivers a full range of products and services for air land and naval forces as well as advanced electronics security information technology solutions and customer support services improving the future and protecting lives is an ambitious mission but its what we do at bae systems working here means using your passion and ingenuity where it counts defending national security with breakthrough technology superior products and intelligence solutions as you develop the latest technology and defend national security you will continually hone your skills on a teammaking a big impact on a global scale at bae systems youll find a rewarding career that truly makes a difference electronic systems es is the global innovator behind bae systems gamechanging defense and commercial electronics exploiting every electron we push the limits of what is possible giving our customers the edge and our employees opportunities to change the world our products and capabilities can be found everywhere from the depths of the ocean to the far reaches of space at our core are more than highly talented electronic systems employees with the brightest minds in the industry we make an impact for our customers and the communities we serve at bae systems we celebrate the array of skills experiences and perspectives our employees bring to the table for us differences are a source of strength were laserfocused on high performance and we work
